## Module 3: Getting and Cleaning Data Assignment
This is a Data Science Course Module 3 assignment in R that demonstrates the student's ability to collect, work with, and clean a data set. Basically, this script aims to prepare tidy data that can be used for later analysis.

###Contents

* *run_analysis.R* - the script to perform the assignment
* *CodeBook.md* - the documentation of the variables and process of the script.
